hiring_velocity.evidence: IBM Consulting typically has steady hiring for delivery centers to support client projects

strength_details: IBM is a well-established, stable enterprise company with global presence
Strong modern tech stack including Spark, big data technologies, and multi-cloud platforms
Clear data engineering focus with ETL pipelines and data modeling responsibilities
concern_details: No salary or compensation information disclosed in job posting
Onsite requirement in Bengaluru East limits flexibility and may require relocation
No career growth, learning opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned
Missing key details about team structure, reporting, and work environment
best_fit_details: Senior data engineers with 5+ years experience in big data technologies and ETL pipelines
Engineers with multi-cloud experience (AWS, Azure, GCP) seeking stable enterprise environment
Professionals comfortable with consulting/client-facing work in delivery center model
probe_details: Ask about salary range, benefits, and total compensation package
Understand team size, composition, and reporting structure
Clarify work hours, overtime expectations, and project timelines
Discuss career progression and growth opportunities within IBM Consulting
leverage_details: Strong Apache Spark and PySpark expertise is valuable for big data roles
Multi-cloud experience across AWS, Azure, and GCP provides flexibility
summary.overall_assessment: Solid data engineering opportunity at established enterprise company with strong technical requirements. Role offers stability and modern tech stack exposure, but lacks transparency on compensation and growth opportunities. Best suited for experienced engineers comfortable with onsite consulting work in Bengaluru.
